nodes.text: Meridian Hall was a gathering place located on Nar Shaddaa during the Cold War between the Galactic Republic and the reconstituted Sith Empire. In 3643 BBY Sith Lord Paladius addressed his Cult of the Screaming Blade in the Meridian Hall, but was interrupted by Kallig, who bribed a technician to detonate the gas pipes running under the Hall, creating an illusion of a Groundquake summoned by Kallig at a precise moment to show a strong possession of power.
Meridian Hall appears in Star Wars: The Old Republic during the Sith Inquisitor class mission on Nar Shaddaa.
